description: Create 6 processing rule files in 03_Processing_Rules/ folder covering entity recognition patterns, participant identification, project matching, and cross-referencing logic.

deliverables.name: 01_Participant_Identification.md
deliverables.description: How to identify participants from transcripts

deliverables.name: 02_Project_Recognition.md
deliverables.description: Project keyword matching and abbreviation detection

deliverables.name: 03_Entity_Recognition.md
deliverables.description: Master recognition workflow for all 12 libraries

deliverables.name: 06_Cross_Reference_Rules.md
deliverables.description: How to create cross-references between entities

quantitative: Entity recognition workflow covers all 12 libraries
Cross-reference rules for all library relationships documented
qualitative: Recognition patterns are clear and actionable
Confidence level assignment logic is well-defined
Cross-referencing logic is sound and validated

dependencies.description: MIL-003 complete (library integration modules define recognition patterns)

notes: Extract and enhance from MAIN_PROMPT_v4.md Processing Guidelines section. Integrate recognition patterns defined in MIL-003 library modules. Follow CREATE_MAIN_PROMPT_v5.md Phase 5.
